      • bind

        public void bind(javafx.beans.binding.BooleanBinding binding)
        Binds achievement to given binding (condition). No-op if achievement is already unlocked.
        Parameters:

        Bind achievement condition to given property.
        Parameters:

        value - the value at which the achievement is unlocked
